snippet.title: Curious elephant seal 'plays tourist' in South Australian town
snippet.content: A curious elephant seal has been spotted 'playing tourist' in the South Australian town of Port MacDonnell. A local spotted the surprise visitor napping on his doorstep last night, before the massive mammal set off to explore the streets of the sea-side town. Members of the public contacted community ranger Dale Millar this morning after becoming concerned for the elephant seal's safety. Mr Millar was filmed using a wheelie bin to carefully guide the animal back to the beach, where it has since returned to the ocean. (C) Nine Digital Pty Ltd 2017
